name: Pie.Ology (May Street South)
text:
pie.ology

HAND PIES MADE WITH HEART

ALL HAND PIES COME FROZEN WITH BAKING INSTRUCTIONS

BREAKFAST HAND PIES, $7.00 each

DELUXE BREAKFAST Tarrymore Farms eggs, ham & bacon from The Commissary, diced red peppers & green onions, cheese

BIG BREAKFAST Tarrymore Farms eggs, sausage made from Maltese ground pork, bacon from Bogdala's, cheese

CLASSIC BREAKFAST Tarrymore Farms eggs, bacon from Bogdala's, a blend of cheese

VEGGIE BREAKFAST Tarrymore Farms eggs, oven roasted tomatoes, tomatillos & peppers, cheese

EAST END BREAKFAST Tarrymore Farms eggs, ham from The Commissary, spring onions, cheese

CAMPFIRE BREAKFAST Eggs, sausage, bacon, baked beans, Heartbeat Hot Sauce red habanero

BREAKFAST POUTINE Tarrymore Farms eggs, bacon from Bogdala's, diced red peppers and green onions, home fries, Thunder Oak cheese curds, Hollandaise-style sauce, cheese

CHIPOTLE STEAK & EGGS Tarrymore Farms eggs, smoky chipotle seasoning blend, striploin steak in a sauce made with chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, lime, cilantro and agave syrup, house-made pickled jalapeños, cheese

HUEVOS RANCHEROS Tarrymore Farms eggs, pico de gallo with jalapeno, refried beans, a blend of cheese

LUNCH/DINNER HAND PIES, $7.00 each

PLOUGHMAN'S North Country Meats mild Italian sausage, mashed potatoes, roasted red peppers, cheese

HAM & SWISS North Country Meats ham, Thunder Oak Swiss cheese, a blend of cheese

ANGRY HAWAIIAN Ham, grilled pineapple, cheese, Heartbeat Hot Sauce pineapple habanero

PIZZA My-Pride Farm pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, a blend of cheese

BBQ BACON CHEESEBURGER Cornell Farms ground beef, slow-cooked onions, bacon, house made BBQ sauce, cheese

SHEPHERD'S Cornell Farms ground beef, mashed potatoes, carrots, peas, cheese, gravy

CHEESEBURGER Cornell Farms ground beef, ketchup, mustard, relish, pickles, cheese

SAUSAGE ROLL Ground pork from Maltese with our own blend of seasoning

MUSHROOM & SWISS Mushrooms sautéed with onions, garlic and herbs, Thunder Oak Swiss cheese, a blend of cheese

TOMATO BASIL DeBruin's Greenhouses roasted Roma tomatoes, nut-free pesto, mozzarella cheese

MAC N' CHEESE Fusilli in a house made creamy cheese sauce

SPICY MAC N' CHEESE Fusilli in a house made creamy cheese sauce, Heartbeat Hot Sauce red habanero

FRUIT/SWEET HAND PIES, $6.50 each

STRAWBERRY RHUBARB Belluz Farms strawberries, garden grown rhubarb, sugar

APPLE Apples, cinnamon, nutmeg, sugar. This hand pie comes in both vegan and non-vegan options

APPLE RASPBERRY Apples, raspberries, sugar. This hand pie comes in both vegan and non-vegan options.

BUMBLEBERRY Apples, strawberries, raspberries, blueberries and sugar. This hand pie comes in both vegan and non-vegan options.

MINI HAND PIES, $4.50 each

SAMOSA Potatoes, peas, East-Indian seasoning and spices

SPINACH & FETA Spinach, red onions, feta cheese, dill

FOR A FULL LIST OF INGREDIENTS PLEASE CONTACT US DIRECTLY
